data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Södermanland that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Södermanland, Sweden
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Södermanland, Sweden.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 27 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Södermanland, Sweden.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Södermanland, Sweden who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 15,783 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Södermanland.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kurd, Kurmanji people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kurd, Kurmanji people.
Father, it’s possible most of the 121,240 lost people in  Södermanland, Sweden have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Södermanland, Sweden will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Södermanland, Sweden to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

location.name: Södermanland
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Tunisian, Jew, Swedish-speaking, Bosniak, Albanian, Yazidi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Tunisian (4,100), Jew, Swedish-speaking (15,000), Bosniak (32,000), Albanian (5,100), Yazidi (4,200)
